languages.text: "Вы упомянули, что во тьме артефакта с вами находился кто-то еще. Это было помутнением... или же правдой?"

traits.locale_text: "Вы упомянули, что во тьме артефакта с вами находился кто-то еще. Это было помутнением... или же правдой?"

languages.text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"
languages.original_text: "Вы упомянули, что во тьме артефакта с вами находился кто-то еще. Это было помутнением... или же правдой?"

traits.locale_text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artifact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"
"You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artifact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"
"You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"
"You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"
"You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"

languages.text: “你之前说，在那件造物产生的黑暗之中，你并非孤身一人。那是你的幻觉吗？还是说，真的有其他人和你在一起？”
languages.original_text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"

traits.locale_text: “你之前说，在那件造物产生的黑暗之中，你并非孤身一人。那是你的幻觉吗？还是说，真的有其他人和你在一起？”

languages.text: «Ha mencionado que no estaba sola en la oscuridad del artefacto. ¿Se trataba de algo imaginario, fruto de su razonamiento nublado, o había alguien más con usted?».
languages.original_text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha mencionado que no estaba sola en la oscuridad del artefacto. ¿Se trataba de algo imaginario, fruto de su razonamiento nublado, o había alguien más con usted?».

languages.text: 「お前は、アーティファクトの暗闇の中で一人きりではなかったと言ったな。それは理性に雲がかかっていたがゆえの産物なのか…それとも、本当に誰かがいたのか？」
languages.original_text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、アーティファクトの暗闇の中で一人きりではなかったと言ったな。それは理性に雲がかかっていたがゆえの産物なのか…それとも、本当に誰かがいたのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr habt erwähnt, dass Ihr in der Dunkelheit des Artefakts nicht allein wart. War das ein Gespinst Eures getrübten Verstands — oder war dort wirklich jemand?"
languages.original_text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt erwähnt, dass Ihr in der Dunkelheit des Artefakts nicht allein wart. War das ein Gespinst Eures getrübten Verstands — oder war dort wirklich jemand?"

languages.text: « Vous avez mentionné que vous n'étiez pas seule dans les ténèbres de l'artefact. Était-ce le produit d'un quelconque délire, ou y avait-il vraiment quelqu'un avec vous ? »
languages.original_text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez mentionné que vous n'étiez pas seule dans les ténèbres de l'artefact. Était-ce le produit d'un quelconque délire, ou y avait-il vraiment quelqu'un avec vous ? »

languages.text: "Eserin karanlığında yalnız olmadığından bahsetmiştin. Aklın bulandığı için hayal etmiş olabilir misin? Yoksa gerçekten yanında birisi mi vardı?"
languages.original_text: "You mentioned not being alone in the darkness of the artefact. Was it a figment of clouded reason — or was there really someone else with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Eserin karanlığında yalnız olmadığından bahsetmiştin. Aklın bulandığı için hayal etmiş olabilir misin? Yoksa gerçekten yanında birisi mi vardı?"
